mapper.select: select t1.itemCode itemCode,t1.itemName itemName, round(ifnull(sum(ifnull(t2.cnt,0))/sum( case when t2.cnt>0 then 1 else 0 end),0.00),2) count from (select hsp.id as itemCode, hsp.item_name as itemName, hsp.seq_no as seqNo from hsp.hsp_config_baseinfo hsp where 1=1 and hsp.id in and length(hsp.item_code)=8 )t1 left join (select t.F_DWBH hospital, F_ZB_LD cnt from ods.financial_expenditure t where 1=1 and t.F_DWBH in and str_to_date(CONCAT(t.F_DATE,'01'), '%Y%m%d') >= #{startDate} and str_to_date(CONCAT(t.F_DATE,'01'), '%Y%m%d')< #{endDate} ) t2 on t1.itemCode = t2.hospital group by t1.itemCode order by t1.seqNo;

select t1.item_code as itemCode, t1.item_name as itemName, round(ifnull(sum(ifnull(t2.cnt,0))/sum( case when t2.cnt>0 then 1 else 0 end),0.00),2) count from hsp.hsp_config_baseinfo t1 left join (select t.F_DWBH hospital, F_ZB_LD cnt from ods.financial_expenditure t where 1=1 and t.F_DWBH in and str_to_date(CONCAT(t.F_DATE,'01'), '%Y%m%d') >= #{startDate} and str_to_date(CONCAT(t.F_DATE,'01'), '%Y%m%d')< #{endDate} ) t2 on t1.item_code = t2.hospital where length(t1.item_code)=10 and t1.id in group by t1.item_code order by count desc
select NULL itemCode,NULL itemName,NULL count from dual WHERE 1!=1;

select t1.itemCode itemCode,t1.itemName itemName,round(ifnull(sum(ifnull(t2.cnt,0))/sum( case when t2.cnt>0 then 1 else 0 end),0.00),2) count from (select hsp.id as itemCode, hsp.item_name as itemName, hsp.seq_no as seqNo from hsp.hsp_config_baseinfo hsp where 1=1 and hsp.id in (select id from hsp.hsp_config_baseinfo where parent_item_code = #{parentId} and id in and length(item_code)=10) )t1 left join (select t.F_DWBH hospital, F_ZB_LD cnt from ods.financial_expenditure t where 1=1 and t.F_DWBH in (select id from hsp.hsp_config_baseinfo where parent_item_code = #{parentId} and id in and length(item_code)=10) and str_to_date(CONCAT(t.F_DATE,'01'), '%Y%m%d') >= #{startDate} and str_to_date(CONCAT(t.F_DATE,'01'), '%Y%m%d')< #{endDate} ) t2 on t1.itemCode = t2.hospital group by t1.itemCode order by t1.seqNo;

select hsp.id,hsp.item_Name itemName, (select round(ifnull(sum(ifnull(F_ZB_LD,0))/sum( case when F_ZB_LD>0 then 1 else 0 end),0.00),2) thisYear from ods.financial_expenditure t where 1=1 and str_to_date(CONCAT(t.F_DATE,'01'), '%Y%m%d') >= #{startDate} and str_to_date(CONCAT(t.F_DATE,'01'), '%Y%m%d')< #{endDate} and t.F_DWBH=hsp.id) countNew, (select round(ifnull(sum(ifnull(F_ZB_LD,0))/sum( case when F_ZB_LD>0 then 1 else 0 end),0.00),2) from ods.financial_expenditure t where 1=1 and str_to_date(CONCAT(t.F_DATE,'01'), '%Y%m%d')>= concat(date_format(#{startDate},'%Y')- 1,date_format(#{startDate},'-%m-%d')) and str_to_date(CONCAT(t.F_DATE,'01'), '%Y%m%d') < concat(date_format(#{endDate},'%Y') - 1 ,date_format(#{endDate},'-%m-%d'),' 23:59:59.0') and t.F_DWBH=hsp.id) countOld from hsp.hsp_config_baseinfo hsp where 1=1 and length(hsp.item_code)=10 and hsp.id in

select t1.itemCode itemCode,t1.itemName itemName, t2.dateData dateData,t2.cnt count from (select hcb.id as itemCode, hcb.item_name as itemName from hsp.hsp_config_baseinfo hcb where 1=1 and length(hcb.item_code)=10 and hcb.id in ) t1 left join (select t.F_DWBH hospital, date_format(str_to_date(CONCAT(t.F_DATE,'01'), '%Y%m%d'),#{dateFormater}) dateData, round(ifnull(sum(ifnull(F_ZB_LD,0))/sum( case when F_ZB_LD>0 then 1 else 0 end),0.00),2) cnt from ods.financial_expenditure t where 1=1 and length(t.F_DWBH)=10 and t.F_DWBH in and str_to_date(CONCAT(t.F_DATE,'01'), '%Y%m%d') >= #{startDate} and str_to_date(CONCAT(t.F_DATE,'01'), '%Y%m%d')< #{endDate} group by t.F_DWBH,dateData ) t2 on t1.itemCode = t2.hospital order by t1.itemCode

select hsp.id,hsp.item_Name itemName, (select round(ifnull(sum(ifnull(F_ZB_LD,0))/sum( case when F_ZB_LD>0 then 1 else 0 end),0.00),2) thisYear from ods.financial_expenditure t where 1=1 and str_to_date(CONCAT(t.F_DATE,'01'), '%Y%m%d') >= #{startDate} and str_to_date(CONCAT(t.F_DATE,'01'), '%Y%m%d')< #{endDate} and t.F_DWBH=hsp.id) countNew, (select round(ifnull(sum(ifnull(F_ZB_LD,0))/sum( case when F_ZB_LD>0 then 1 else 0 end),0.00),2) from ods.financial_expenditure t where 1=1 and str_to_date(CONCAT(t.F_DATE,'01'), '%Y%m%d')>= concat(date_format(#{startDate},'%Y')- 1,date_format(#{startDate},'-%m-%d')) and str_to_date(CONCAT(t.F_DATE,'01'), '%Y%m%d') < concat(date_format(#{endDate},'%Y') - 1 ,date_format(#{endDate},'-%m-%d'),' 23:59:59.0') and t.F_DWBH=hsp.id) countOld from hsp.hsp_config_baseinfo hsp where 1=1 and length(hsp.item_code)=10 and hsp.comm_config_unitgrade_id=(select comm_config_unitgrade_id from hsp.hsp_config_baseinfo where item_Name=#{hspName});
